name: Legends Prototype
description:
A prototype for a spiritual successor to the Megaman Legends series with a 2D Megaman Zero 3 spin!

The goal is to recreate the experience of Megaman Legends for those that enjoyed those titles a much as I did when I was a kid and I want anyone that shares that passion to join the rest of the Megaman community in creating this love letter to a greatly under appreciated series to make it the best it can be for us all.

IMPORTANT!!! Be sure to actually left click in the game window or it will not play!

-------------------------

Controls:

W - Left

A - Jump

D - Right

Double Tap W or D - Strafe

S - Shoot

Mouse - Aim

Space Bar - Interact

-------------------------

**This prototype may use assets that are not commercially viable at first as place holders (including characters, sfx, music, etc) so be aware this will change to avoid legal repercussions**
